attributes.action: immediately scrap the Consumer Price Index as the measure of inflation on the high street in favour of the Retail Price Index which is the more accurate and truthful reflection of prices on the high street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CPI is a politically expedient con which does nothing to properly reflect the rising prices of today (June 2008).  The Retail Price Index, which was always known to be properly reflective of high street prices - which is what the government do NOT want us to know - should replace it.
